Post Title: East Hollywood Spanish Studio Remodeled
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Gillman Apartments has put the finishing touches on our latest pet friendly studio apartment conveniently located between Hollywood, Silverlake and Koreatown. Close to Freeway. Close to Bus lines. The unit itself is located on second floor with windows facing the north side. No direct sun/heat. New tiled floor, kitchen, bathroom. This vintage building has many architectural features not found in the modern buildings. For those tenants that can appreciate vintage LA, this unit will not last long at this price. Call or text Rebecca who can set up a time for you to safely preview. Laundry in the basement. Downside is street parking only.

Post Title: East Hollywood Spanish Studio ALL UTILIITES
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Why pay Silverlake prices. Gillman Apartments has a rare opening in our 1930s Spanish style pet friendly building in East Hollywood. Just a few blocks from the metro at Santa Monica and Vermont, our location is close to anywhere you need to go in Los Angeles. We are aware of all the changes COVID has brought over the past year, so we have set up sitting areas in the back, with table umbrella and string lights. We have also opened up the roof area with tables and chairs to view the skyline and the stars at night. The unit itself has been updated with tile flooring, tile counter on new white kitchen cabinets refrigerator and stove, and an updated bathroom. Unit 203 faces the north cooler side in the warm summer months quickly approaching. Come walk the property and see what this up and coming area has to offer. These units go quick with all utilities included. Downside is street parking only, but by permit, so not as bad as many areas. You can also ask Rebecca for ideas on how to approach other buildings in the area to get a parking spot.

Post Title: Gorgegous East Hollywood Room for Rent
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

We (one female - 34 and one male-31 ) are looking for one roommate in their late 20's early 30's to fill two rooms that will be opening up July 1st. Rent is $1275 for the room, plus utilities. There is a $1490 security deposit due before move in date. It’s slightly higher , I know... but that is in part because the rent is very reasonable for the space etc. Female or males welcome to apply.

The HOUSE is an absolute dream. I moved in here two years ago and I simply adore it. Super thankful for the place and looking for others who will enjoy what a great situation it is as well. Not only is your room huge and in it's own corner with TWO closets, but there's so much footage in the common areas. This includes a dining room, living room, desk area near the living room, huge kitchen, dishwasher, washer and dryer in unit AND parking. Shared bathroom. Roku TV in the living room with (non working) but pretty fireplace with backsplash. Lots of light in this beautiful space.

The house was an airbnb before I moved in, so there are already some amazing furniture pieces in the house. Some pictures I've posted are from the listing from two years year ago, the current living room set up is shown in the posting. The bedroom comes furnished. The picture with the pinkish vibes is no longer happening. It's just a KING sized bed that you can make your own styling choices with. I am in the market for a few new living room seating arrangements, but in general the person moving in should not be bringing much for communal furniture as the vibe is minimalist / wabi sabi interiors, not big on clutter- this is V important. Photos above are from the stock photos from when I originally rented the home but I added an IRL photo of the living room. We keep it simple so its very similar.

Looking for someone who is clean and picks up after themselves. Please only inquire if you know this to be true about yourself, and is not a question. Yet!... also looking for someone who doesn't mind music being played and general pleasant vibes. We both are into music, all of it and listen to it often. People who enjoy mindfulness, positive communication behaviors, and home as the sanctuary please apply. We do not have pets but we LOVE them and watch our neighbors dogs sometimes. Hobbies for me include : art/drawing, acting, photography, juicing/cooking, strangers. Hobbies for him include : candle making, hikes/nature/camping, photography, bread.

We are looking for longer term rentals (1 yr) and not subleases at this time. No couples, thank you. 420 :)

Neighborhood is East Hollywood. I love this area in general. Very close to West Hollywood , Silverlake , Echo Park , Larchmont and on the edge of K Town. Could not be more central! The house is in between Santa Monica Blvd. and Melrose off Western Ave. Down the street is a Smart and Final for quick grocery grabs, a Taco Bell, McDonalds, Dave's Hot Chicken, and Chick-fi-la . Gold Diggers is a classic bar establishment that I love and go to occasionally for one or two, once it opens back up :)

Up-and-coming East Hollywood is as central as it gets. Just a short 5 minute drive to Los Feliz, Silver Lake, Koreatown, the heart of Hollywood and the 101 freeway. Lots of development underway, including newly-opened Target within walking distance, shops along Fountain Avenue, and a large, 5-acre retail development under construction at Santa Monica and St. Andrews. Laundry facilities on premises. Tenant pays electric and gas. Landlord pays water and garbage. No smoking is permitted and pets accepted on a case-by-case basis. Optional parking garage for $100/month. One month rent security deposit and first month to move in.

Post Title: East Holly- Silverlake adj Vintage Studio
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Gillman Apartments has put the finishing touches on our latest pet friendly studio apartment conveniently located between Hollywood, Silverlake and Koreatown. Close to Freeway. Close to Bus lines. The unit itself is located on second floor in the quieter back with windows facing the north and east side. Good morning sun. Tiled floor, full kitchen with appliances, updated bathroom. This vintage building has many architectural features not found in the modern buildings. For those tenants that can appreciate vintage LA, this unit will not last long at this price. Call or text Rebecca who can set up a time for you to safely preview. Laundry in the basement. Downside is street parking only, however we do have an enclosed garage available. Ask Rebecca details.

Post Title: 3+2 baths - Spanish style fireplace hardwood floors quiet neighborhood
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

DO NOT ASK IF STILL AVAILABLE...IF THIS AD IS UP, THE HOUSE IS AVAILABLE FOR RENT...

If you wish to see the property, please email the property manager the following information with your:

1. NAMES
2. CONTACT info: Cell number and email address required
3. MOVING DATE and date you have already given notice to your current landlord
4. NUMBER of people in your family or group
5. VIEWING schedule: days and times you can see (weekdays, evenings after work, weekends only?)

Large living room with Fireplace, dome ceiling great for awesome stereo sound; nearly all neighbors work for studios; large formal dining room; Hardwood floors throughout, nice updated kitchen with cutting block island, stained glass windows and new Italian porcelain slate tile floor (see pictures); good floor plan with privacy-each bedroom has its own door, new patio, big yard for pets, big dogs ok, Dog run, big 2-car garage for office, storage, workshop, art studio or recording studio complete with electrical, many artists/musician neighbors recording, practicing ok, W/D hookups, new plumbing, new electrical throughout, new roof,

Near great schools, Recording Studios-Track One on the corner, CBS, Disney, neighborhood watch, nice area in the valley...close to Ventura Blvd. and everything; 12 miles to downtown or West LA and 2 minutes to Burbank studios, adjacent to Toluca Lake. New CBS Studios down the street at Universal City with Metro station there at City Walk.

Walking distance to Metro NoHo station at Lankershim just blocks away and NoHo Arts District with all new restaurants and theaters just blocks away and shopping centers.

If you have any questions, please email property manager.

The interior, except the kitchen, is now repainted with all clean white. I do not have current pictures of the white color walls, but the pictures below show the style and layout. New tenants are welcome to repaint to their style and taste and manager will assist with the cost of paint chosen by the tenants. No reduction in rent or deposit for any painting as house was recently painted and is clean and everything in working condition and to be taken as is.

This is a rare opportunity in such a quiet neighborhood and it will not last.

This is a great location...central to everywhere...largest home in the area, but doesn't look it from the outside...will not last, grab it today!

Adjacent to Toluca Lake, Toluca Lake West Toluca Woods, North Hollywood, Studio City, Universal City, No Ho Arts District, Burbank, Valley Village, Sherman Oaks San Fernando Valley East

Post Title: 1 Bedroom 1 BA in Studio City + Gym + Soothing Spa + $500 Off Move-in!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

♥ $500 Off Move-in Special! ♥


♥ About the Community ♥
At the Ritz Apartment community in Studio City, CA, each luxury living space is designed with you in mind. The Ritz is the essence of prestigious living in a prime neighborhood setting, with easy access to four different major freeways as well as the Warner Bros, Disney, Universal and NBC studios. The bustling Ventura Blvd. district is also nearby, with shopping, cafes, and a little nightlife. Inside the apartments, every detail has been added with care to ensure the highest level of comfort and enjoyment for residents. Excellent layout options give you different choices for apartments that suit your lifestyle, all within this apartment community. On the outside, the Ritz offers beautifully landscaped surroundings and a unique indoor swimming pool opening onto a deck with an outdoor spa. Whether you want a view of the lush inner courtyard or a window over looking the bright city lights, we have an apartment home to fit you!


♥ Features ♥
- Cable TV Ready
- Assigned Subterranean Gated Parking
- Mirrored Wardrobe Closet*
- Custom Crafted Oak Cabinetry
- Laundry Facilities on Every Floor
- Indoor Swimming Pool
- Beautiful Courtyard
- Soothing Spa
- Responsive Maintenance
- Dishwashers
- New Carpet*
- Fitness Center
- Controlled Access Entry
- Storage Available
- Vertical Blinds
- Friendly, Professional On­Site Management
- Disposal
- Walk In Closet *
- Fireplace*
- Microwave
- Central Air & Heating*
- Intrusion Alarm
- Patio/Balcony*
- New Appliances*
- Oversized Pantry*
- Professionally Landscaped Grounds
- Refrigerator (Available to Rent)
- Elevator Service
* In Select Units



♥ Driving Directions ♥
From Downtown L.A: Drive North on Highway 101 (the Hollywood Freeway) past the​ Hollywood Bowl and Universal City, and tke the Vineland Ave exit. Turn right at Vineland, and then Turn right on Bloomfield Street. The Ritz ​ will be on the corner to your left; you may park on​ Vineland Avenue or Bloomfield Street.

From west & central San Fernando Valley: Drive South/East on Highway 101 (the Ventura​ Freeway) towards Hollywood, and take the Vineland Ave exit. Turn left on Vineland, and take the second right onto Bloomfield Street. The Ritz​ will be on the corner to your right; you may park on​ Vineland Avenue or Bloomfield Street.


10947 Bloomfield Street
Studio City, CA

Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

$500 Off Move-in Special!!


♥ About the Community ♥
At the Ritz Apartment community in Studio City, CA, each luxury living space is designed with you in mind. The Ritz is the essence of prestigious living in a prime neighborhood setting, with easy access to four different major freeways as well as the Warner Bros, Disney, Universal and NBC studios. The bustling Ventura Blvd. district is also nearby, with shopping, cafes, and a little nightlife. Inside the apartments, every detail has been added with care to ensure the highest level of comfort and enjoyment for residents. Excellent layout options give you different choices for apartments that suit your lifestyle, all within this apartment community. On the outside, the Ritz offers beautifully landscaped surroundings and a unique indoor swimming pool opening onto a deck with an outdoor spa. Whether you want a view of the lush inner courtyard or a window over looking the bright city lights, we have an apartment home to fit you!

- Cable TV Ready

♥ Driving Directions ♥
From Downtown L.A: Drive North on Highway 101 (the Hollywood Freeway) past the​ Hollywood Bowl and Universal City, and tke the Vineland Ave exit. Turn right at Vineland, and then Turn right on Bloomfield Street. The Ritz ​ will be on the corner to your left; you may park on​ Vineland Avenue or Bloomfield Street.

From west & central San Fernando Valley: Drive South/East on Highway 101 (the Ventura​ Freeway) towards Hollywood, and take the Vineland Ave exit. Turn left on Vineland, and take the second right onto Bloomfield Street. The Ritz​ will be on the corner to your right; you may park on​ Vineland Avenue or Bloomfield Street.

Post Title: Spacious 1 Bed + 1 Bath Now Leasing! Live in the Heart of E. Hollywood
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Find your new home in the heart of the East Hollywood! Live in the Little Armenia Neighborhood convenient to Los Feliz!

Our charming style 1 bedroom apartment features original hardwood-style flooring, 1950's style built in shelves, freshly painted, updated lighting and plumbing fixtures, vintage tile, lots of cabinet and closet space! Parking and Laundry Facility on-site. We accept pets, please inquire about breed restrictions.

1601 Normandie is located on a quiet street off of Hollywood Blvd., offers many restaurants, coffee shops, bars, banks, UPS, USPS, grocers like Ralphs, Vons, Albertson's and Gelson's Market and so much more!

Conveniently located near Kaiser & Hollywood Presbyterian. Nearby transportation such as Metro, Vermont/Sunset Station, Sunset/Normandie Station. Ferndell Trail and Barnsdall Art Park are within blocks of this apartment as well as schools such as Helen Bernstein HS,Immaculate Heart HS and Grant Elementary.

Please call/text Dino at show contact info to schedule a tour.

Website: https://www.skypropertiesinc.com/apartments-for-rent-in-los-angeles/

Media Towers is nestled in a quiet residential Hollywood Village area between Hollywood and Sunset Boulevards. At the edge of trendy East Hollywood, the neighborhood is filled with locally owned restaurants, bodegas, coffee shops and shopping. Residents enjoy newly renovated homes with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, quartz & granite counters, on-site maintenance and office staff. Rent payments and service request are easy with our online systems. Add the roof top pool with panoramic views of Griffith Observatory, Hollywood Sign and Downtown LA, and you have a community you will love calling home.

Post Title: Furnished Short Term Sublease - Room + Bathroom in West Hollywood Area
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

** Available July 1st, 2021 for short-term sublease from 1 to 3 months **

I have a furnished private bedroom with en-suite bathroom in my 2 bed, 2 bath apartment for $1,850 per month which includes all utilities.

Before you read the ad-- No smokers, no pets, and this room is for single occupancy, so no couples.

- The room is available from July 1st to September 30th, and you can sublease for a minimum of 1 month, up to 3 months.
- Private bedroom with en-suite bathroom and closet.
- Room is furnished with bed & linens, desk and dresser. Towels also provided.
- Air conditioning & ceiling fan.
- The best neighborhood in LA with a 9.1 out of 10 walkability score.
- Walking distance to beverly center, 3rd st restaurants, trader joes, target and Whole Foods
- Upscale furnishings in common areas.
- Parking is available in a tandem spot.
- Laundry within the building

$1,800 per month. Utilities are included. Access to Netflix, Hulu and HBOMax in the living room.

Month-to-month sublease agreement.

I am a 33 year old white guy who lives in the other room. I'm a television producer and tennis player. I'm a really laid back, quiet, hyper-clean guy and looking for the same. The common areas are furnished with expensive, upscale furniture and I am looking for someone who will be respectful of this and take care of it. The vibe at the apartment is typically quiet and relaxing.

If you're just moving to LA and looking for a safe place to land while you find your long-term living situation, this may be the spot for you. The neighborhood is central in LA, right in the center of the 4 bordering freeways (101 to the north, 110 to the east, 10 to the south, 405 to the west). If you don't have a car, you'll find this a great neighborhood to start in because you can walk to trader joes, Whole Foods, target, the Beverly Center mall, and over 50 restaurants/coffee shops/juice bars/bakeries within 2 minutes of the apartment. All you'll need is your own clothes to move in as everything else is taken care of.

E-mail me some information about you! Where are you from? What do you do for a living? What's your work schedule like? Are you currently working from home? What are your hobbies? Feel free to link your social media, too.

Post Title: Hollywood Hills Mediterranean Executive Home
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

REDUCED & READY FOR MOVE-IN!!!

FRESHLY PAINTED!

Located on a semi-private street off Beachwood Drive & Beachwood Canyon hiking trails and horse stables. Custom Executive 2-Story Mediterranean Hollywood Hills Canyon View home. Enjoy the view with wrap around balcony!

Main home with 4 bedrooms and 5 ½ baths.

Entertainer’s dream with formal dining room, family room with wet bar, high wood beam ceiling, fireplace, bay windows, portrait windows and double French doors leading out to a canyon view terrace and outdoor covered veranda with gas/wood burning fireplace.

Includes home office/den and indoor laundry room off of attached 2-car garage entry into house. Spacious master suite with fireplace, walk-in closet, large private bath with spa tub, walk-in double shower stall and two separate vanity sink stations.

The historic 'HOLLYWOOD' sign can be seen from the master bedroom’s private terrace. Each bedroom has own full bath and private canyon view balcony. Gourmet kitchen with chef’s island, double oven, granite counters and loads of custom cabinets.

Hardwood, marble and travertine stone flooring and crown molding throughout includes attached 2-car garage with ample driveway parking and semi-private street parking.

Will consider dogs and cats with additional deposit.

Minutes to Hollywood Bowl, Universal Studios and Burbank Media Center.

Prefer a one year lease term.

Will consider a shorter term lease period of 6-months and furnished at $20,500 per month.

Please call for showing and additional information.

Post Title: 1 bedroom w/private bath avail in 2 bed 2 bath apt. available Aug. 1st
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

It's a couple of months out but I wanted to begin my search now. If you want to lock something down in LA early this may be a great fit for you.

1 bedroom 1 bathroom available August 1st. in 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apt. The room is actually available on Jul. 27th, so if you want to move in early you can without having to pay extra. Rent payments start in August. 1 parking spot in covered garage. Gym and laundry in building. Newly remodeled courtyard with comfortable seating and tables. This building is in East Hollywood, in the heart of Thai Town directly below Los Feliz, Griffith Park and AFI, just 2 blocks from the Hollywood/Western stop on the Red Line. It’s a 5 min drive to the 101, a 15 minute drive to Silverlake or Hollywood and a 20 minute drive to downtown LA. Everything is under 30 minutes away unless you’re going to Santa Monica or near the beach. This location is insanely convenient. The area is walkable and feels very safe. It’s far enough out of Hollywood that it's quiet and feels like a neighborhood. There is cheap Thai food everywhere and Ralphs/Ross/Daiso/Marshals/Starbucks/Ice cream/Chase and more are all a 3 min walk way (+ $35/hour Thai massages…)
I'm the roommate moving out of the apartment and have lived here for the last year. I love this apartment and am only leaving because I am moving to Atlanta for work. The furniture you see in the common areas will be coming with me so you and Eylam (my current roommate) will have a clean slate to create a living space that works for you both! Bedroom has a large closet with storage space above, and the window in your room has blinds. The best part is that you have your own private bathroom in the hall! Total rent is $2,130, so you’re paying $1,065/month plus utilities. Internet: $50/month, (you’re paying $25) plus gas/electricity which is every other month and is between $50-$70, which we split (so even on the high end it's only $19 a month). There is a dishwasher, central AC and heat. About my roommate Eylam: He’s a great guy who’s very clean and responsible. Kind and understanding, and as an added plus is always on time with rent/utility payments. He is pet friendly but definitely not looking to live with a couple. If you're dating someone of course live your life but he's not looking for two new roommates, just one. Last but perhaps most importantly, it's critical that you've been taking covid seriously. Eylam will be conducting interviews online, but if you can show you’re vaccinated, we are more than happy to hold an in-person showing. We are both fully vaccinated here. We're hoping that whoever responds finds this comforting and not problematic. P.S. You’ll need to meet my landlord and get on the lease so if serious please be ready with the necessary paperwork. Require security deposit of $780 for the apt and $105 for the electricity deposit. $880 deposit in total.--

Post Title: *1ST MONTH FREE* CENTRAL Hollywood, LARGE, GATED, CLOSE to EVERYTHING
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Welcome to Las Palmas Apartments! We are conveniently located in the middle of it all (near Highland and between Sunset/Melrose) – amongst many shops, restaurants, entertainment venues, studios, and famous landmarks. Head west on Sunset Boulevard and you find West Hollywood with its restaurants, nightlife and the Chateau Marmont. Head north a few blocks to Hollywood Boulevard and you find Hollywood with the Chinese Theater, Walk of Fame and Hollywood Hills. Head south a few blocks and you find the shops and restaurants of Melrose Avenue and Santa Monica Boulevard. Head east and you find Little Armenia and Thai Town.

We have several transportation options like bus/metro stops and the 101 freeway entrance nearby. Our apartments are large and feature granite countertops and central AC/heating. Our building is gated with security cameras and we are pet friendly.

Post Title: Room for Rent in West Hollywood
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Though we're sad to see her go, our fourth roommate is moving in with her boyfriend and we're looking for a new person to join our 4 bedroom/2 bath home in WeHo. Our apartment is the upper level of a duplex in an incredible location: just off the corner of Melrose/La Brea it's walking distance from the Grove, Fairfax flea market, tons of cool bars, stores, and more. We're all pretty close and sometimes go out/hang out together, so ideally we'd like someone who'd be down to do the same, but if you want to keep to yourself that's cool too. We like to keep shared spaces neat and clean but aren't OCD about it.

Rent is $1,000 a month + utilities and wifi. There's also a security deposit of 1,000. The room can come furnished if you are interested in keeping any of the furniture, just let us know. You'll share a bathroom with two other roommates, Darius and Buck, both of whom do a great job at keeping it clean and being mindful of the others who share it. There's a fully stocked kitchen and furnished apartment (though we're totally open to you bringing your own furniture). The place has a lot of spacious and is in a nice cool, safe neighborhood. There is also central ac so even during the hot summers you will still be cool and comfortable! We also have a washer and dryer in the apartment, so you have the luxury of doing your laundry in the comfort of your home. There's permitted parking on our street so street parking is never an issue and we all spilt the cost of the permits. The lease is technically month-to-month, but we're ideally looking for someone who would stay for a while. The room officially opens July 1st, but if you want to move in earlier, we're open to that.

MEET THE GANG:
Darius: 28, works for a marketing and advertising firm, Likes to be active and enjoys working out and hiking. Also enjoys hanging out with friends, listening to music, and is a huge J.cole fan since he is from the east coast.

Carrie: 25, originally from Baltimore moved to LA from New Orleans 3 years ago. Works far too many hours at a talent agency. When not working she enjoys spending too much money on food, alcohol, traveling and fancy candles. Also, a big fan of getting stoned and water coloring, You should try it, it’s very therapeutic.

Buck: 28 from Baltimore and has been living in LA for 5 years. Pre-covid he was very outgoing and hopes to get back to it soon. He works in the entertainment industry and loves chatting about all things film and tv. He enjoys meeting new people and excited to find someone to join the sycamore fam.


YOU: In your twenties, fully employed, friendly, nice, respectful, neat, and non-cigarette smoker. Must be 420 friendly. Please send us a brief bio and any social media handles! We will begin to show the room/apartment in June! Please let me know if you have any questions!

Post Title: Luxury Penthouse Loft for productions / photo shoots and events
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Beautiful natural light living room type loft / studio with floor to ceiling windows, corner unit, tons of east, south and west light, hard wood floors, white, glass and chrome furniture, and huge wrap around balcony, and sweeping views, sunrise and sunset. Main shooting space is 25'x17' but south wall of windows is at a slight angle so that's an average on the 17' dimension. 2 sliding glass doors, one on south side, one on east, makes it easy to shoot from outside as well. Full kitchen with coffee maker, microwave, fridge, sink, dishwasher, stove and oven. Large Master bedroom also available for photo shoots or productions. Almost all furniture is movable, except for bed. Unit is on 10th floor in high rise building in the Arts District of North Hollywood.
To see more pics and videos:
www.lightspacelocations.com Instagram: @lightspacelocations
May also consider a roommate
Rent by the hour (4 hour minimum) or by the day. Text me for rates.
Pool, hot tub, gym and rec room in building, which may or may not be available depending on current restrictions, just ask.
One block away from the metro, walking distance to Arts District coffee shops, bars and restaurants, walk score of 84, close to Universal Studios.
Great for photo, video shoots, events, online fitness or dance classes, etc!

1 Parking spaces in garage, lots of meter parking and residential parking with no time limit on street to the west of the building.
Lots of light throughout entire apartment!

Square footage is entire place.

I can send a video or FaceTime with you if you want.

See IG below: Feel free to DM me @tracykahn.

Post Title: Lovely 2bed 2bath with garage and in unit laundry
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

This is a lovely 2 bed/2 bath condo for rent. This master bedroom is very spacious and has its own private bathroom and a huge walk-in closet. During the day it is very sunny and at night it is very quiet. This condo has a dryer and washer within. It also comes with 2 tandem parking spots. The rent will cover water and garbage bill.

The location is convenient and is close to the Metro Red Line. There are also many restaurants nearby. The condo is a 7-minute walk to the nearby Children's Hospital and Kaiser Hospital. If you work in any of the hospitals, you likely don't need to drive if you don't want to.

Bright newly renovated 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom (the 3rd bedroom is actually a large dining room or den)

Rent: Contract rent $3200, with a discounted rent of $2800 good for the whole year
Lease Term: 1 year only *Great for students*
Address: 2320 39th Street, Los Angeles, 90008


About this unit:
Spacious 2 Bedrooms, large den/dining room ,1 Bathroom duplex newly remodeled, within close range of USC. This apartment has hardwood flooring throughout, with brand new quartz counter tops, with a calacatta backsplash and shaker cabinets. This unit has stainless steel appliances including a stove, large dishwasher, huge double door fridge, and contemporary stove hood. It also includes a separate utility room that contains washer and dryer; new bathroom vanity, and LED track lighting. Air conditioning is also provided in each bedroom. Unit has a privatized large gated patio area with new patio furniture perfect for your barbecue, is newly landscaped for environmental conservation, and includes 2 tandem parking spots, including one in a garage.

Located in the heart of Liemert Park less than 1 mile from the Expo Line and only 2 miles from USC. There is also a separate work/storage room for artistic creatives.


Featured amenities:
- Stainless Steel Fridge
- Range, Oven & Designer Hood
- Dishwasher

About Ownership and Management: Palmer Properties is a 55 year old company and was the developer of the property. Julie has been the manager for over 15 years and Jose has been the maintenance engineer for over 12 years. Both Julie and Jose have a lot of pride in maintaining the properties and servicing our clients. Palmer, Julie and Jose continue to improve and adapt to make the apartment living (and now your work from home) experience as safe and enjoyable as possible during these unusual times.

Perfectly located to enjoy the benefits of urban living, while maintaining the charm of a quiet Hollywood neighborhood, the residential East Hollywood. A vibrant and diverse neighborhood located in the heart of Los Angeles, East Hollywood is a well-known artist enclave, flourishing with nearby Los Feliz and Silverlake as the epicenter of hip since the 1990’s. Bordering Little Armenia-the hIghly walkable ‘hood is filled with blocks of vintage shops, casual bars, and art galleries. East Hollywood is a great place to leave your car behind. Get out and explore Barnsdall Art Park, and nearby Griffith Park is a perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of city life. Commuting from East Hollywood is a breeze, just hop on the 101 or head to the Metro station at Vermont & Sunset to catch the Red Line, providing traffic-free access to DTLA and the Valley in minutes.

THE APARTMENT

- Hardwood Flooring

Post Title: Vinyl Wood Flooring ~ Remodeled 2 Bed 2 BA in N. Westlake ~ Balcony
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post


Square Footage Is Approximate.
Price and availability may change.

 The Collective
131, 143 & 171 South Burlington Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90057
Call: show contact info

The Collective is the ultimate destination for comfortable living in the heart of Los Angeles. Feel the pulse of the city while enjoying the comfort of your apartment home. Embrace the convenience of being just minutes away from downtown Los Angeles points of interest such as Vista Hermosa Natural Park, world-famous Sunset Boulevard, Dodger Stadium, Staples Center, The Museum of Contemporary Art, Walt Disney Concert Hall, and Los Angeles Central Library, just to name a few. In such a convenient location, residents relish in being close to so many necessities and fun destinations. Restaurants, shopping, schools, and parks are all just steps away. Our apartments for rent in Los Angeles are less than a mile away from the junction of the 101 and 110 highways. Commuting never looked so simple. Choosing to make our Los Angeles apartments your new home is an easy decision. Our versatile space is suitable for anyone to feel comfortable. Enjoy our well-planned apartments, on-site laundry care center, and sunny courtyard social hubs perfect for enjoying a warm LA afternoon. The Collective is located right at the crossroads of culture and community in the historic Westlake North neighborhood. Surrounded on all sides by vibrant city living, our community brings a breath of fresh air to a neighborhood brimming with life. Our one and two-bedroom apartments will provide the comfort and space you crave. Contact us today to learn more about our apartments in Los Angeles, CA.


Apartment Features
- Newly Renovated
- Quartz Countertops
- Brushed Nickel Hardware (In Select Units)
- Stainless Steel Appliances
- Balcony
- New Cabinets
- Mirrored Closet
- Full Kitchen
- Vinyl Wood Flooring


Community Features
- Three Social Courtyards

- Hollywood Sign Views

- On-Site Management

Post Title: Very Large Room with private bath, pool & jacuzzi near Runyon Canyon !
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Available July 1st. 6 month minimum. Ideally looking for someone long term. Looking for a male roommate who is not working from home full time.
I'm offering a bedroom in my large 2 bedroom / 2 bath apartment located in one of the best, quietest, nature and hike filled neighborhoods in LA.

The building has a hot tub, pool, elevators, 1000 megabit fiber internet, dedicated indoor garage parking spots, large balcony, central air / heat, fireplace, dishwasher, mail room with automated package lockers, coin laundry machines, and great views of a tree-lined calm street in the hill behind Hollywood.

The room available is very large and has its own full private bathroom and lots of closet space. Unfurnished & Carpeted.

You will have 330 sq. ft of private space to yourself! The bedroom is 17.5ft by 11ft. plus a private hallway with dual closets 8ft. by 10ft. plus a private bathroom 8ft. by 7ft.

You can walk in 60 seconds to the beautiful Runyon Canyon park, go for a hike, hang in nature, take Yoga and other exercise classes daily. Within a 10min. walk you can reach the businesses, bars, gyms, grocery stores and restaurants of Hollywood.

Easy access to 101, 134, 170, and 5 Freeways, and the 10 is just 15 to 20 minute drive.

I'm a professional filmmaker in his mid 30s, laid back but tidy, originally from the East Coast, and have enjoyed living in this great neighborhood the past few years. I work from home and I work on shoots outside the home. I love hiking, film/TV, music festivals, yoga, being social, traveling, Burning Man, swimming & SCUBA!

Please send a link to your Facebook or Instagram or LinkedIn account when you email me.

Utilities ($100/month per person): Water, Power, Gas, 1000 Megabit Fiber Internet

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IMPORTANT! READ THIS BEFORE EMAILING ME!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-No couples
-Prefer you are a male in your 20s or 30s
-You are employed / working
-No pets

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
******Yes, this is still available. This will be deleted once it's not available.******* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It is a safe, quiet, serene and peaceful home with a large garden. HARDWOOD FLOORS THROUGHOUT THE WHOLE HOUSE

SUMMER IS HERE,
WE HAVE THE TOOLS:

Surfboards, boogie boards, beach gear, beach cruiser, golf clubs, tennis rackets/balls, all for you to use if you desire.

I am a 39 year old Female who works for the City of Santa Monica, super chill, clean, respectful, a solid person all around.
other two roommates are super chill work long hours super friendly and respectful -

SHARED UTILITIES

security deposit $1,250.00 (you may pay in two payments)

Zen House is located in a residential, upscale neighborhood.
5 minutes from LAX air terminals and the LAX bus center and a green line light rail stop, making it convenient for business travelers as well as tourists. LMU and Otis colleges are in the neighborhood along with many churches.
Within walking distance, Walk east and in 7 minutes you find supermarket (Ralphs), a Trader Joes; CVS Pharmacy, Target and a variety of restaurants.
Westchester park with a public 18 hole golf course; tennis and basketball courts is a 15 minute walk.

Perfectly situated to explore all of the most desired beach communities. If driving it is minutes from Marina Del Rey; Silicon Beach; Venice Beach; Santa Monica and Malibu to the north and Manhattan Beach, Hermosa Beach and Redondo Beach to the south. Each of these communities has an abundance of shopping and dining opportunities and miles of white sandy beaches.

Post Title: Sunny Bedroom near Runyon with Private Bath, AC, Secure Parking
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Hello!

I’m looking for a roommate in Runyon Canyon / Hollywood Hills for Available June 1st.

6 month minimum. Ideally looking for someone long term. Looking for a male roommate who is not working from home full time.

The available bedroom is very large and has its own full private bathroom and lots of closet space. The building has a hot tub, pool, elevators, indoor parking, central air / heat, dishwasher, mail room with package lockers, laundry machines, and great views with plenty of sunlight!

Rent is $1300/month + $100 utilities including Gigabit Fiber internet!

I'm a professional filmmaker in his mid 30s, laid back but tidy, originally from the East Coast, and have enjoyed living in this great neighborhood the past few years. I work from home and I work on shoots outside the home. I love hiking, film/TV, music festivals, yoga, traveling, Burning Man, swimming & SCUBA!

- What you currently do for work
- Where are you living now and what is your current living situation
- Link to your Facebook or Instagram or LinkedIn account

Thanks for checking out this ad!

Beautiful Full Service Luxury Style Condo Building "The Hollywood" 2 Bedrooms 2.5 Bathrooms 2 Parking Side by Side, Central A/C, Laundry Inside The Unit Private Balcony 1,400 SqFt


Open layout Unit with a Nine-Foot plus Ceilings is a 2 Large bedrooms and 2 Master Bathrooms plus 1 Guest Bathroom spread out across 1,400 sqft. Nicely appointed with Terrazzo & Walnut Hardwood Floors, Features a Chef's Kitchen with Pedini cabinetry, Fleetwood windows, Hansgrohe & Duravit bath fixtures, and Built in Security Systems, room for a large dining table, and a living area with a Fireplace and Sliding Doors to the east facing your own Private Balcony.

Washer and Dryer Inside the Unit, Fireplace in the Living Room, and comes with Two Side by Side Parking Spaces in the Gated Parking Building Garage, a Second Floor Unit (five stories building). In addition to this beautiful condo, the building has Top Notch Amenities Including Pool, Spa Built in Bbq, Professional Level Gym and Lounge with Pool Table. An Uber Chic Lobby 24 hour Doorman / Security, Tons of Guest Parking.

Located right next to downtown Hollywood to all the Shops, Restaurants, and Entertainment Venues. A rare Walkable Neighborhood in LA, offering the ability to walk to a plethora of goods and services. Building Designed by Hollywood Award winning Architect "Steven Kanner's".

Post Title: BRIGHT, SPANISH STYLE, GRANITE TOPS, FREEBIES, NEAR KAISER PERMANENTE
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Available June 2, 2021. Here is an ideal apartment because of its modern and warm interior, reasonable priced, fine design, good location, and for the charm and character of the place. This one bedroom apartment with free Satellite TV service, Wireless internet (Wi-Fi) free, a washer and dryer in the unit, and of course free water, trash, gardening, and exterior lighting.
We are south of the prestigious Kaiser Permanente Sunset Blvd. Hospital, it is a small, Spanish style complex, in a quite community.
This is a Second story apartment, with great interior. A private FREE satellite dish service which include expensive HBO channels. It has hardwood floors, granite kitchen counters and two A/C, plus a washer and dryer IN the service area inside the apartment. The apartment has bright exposure to the south, to the east and to the north.
Beautiful hardwood floors, dining area in the kitchen, fridge and gas-range, ceramic flooring in the kitchen and bathroom. This place is a great Hollywood location to call home (We had even endured a three-day movie shoot here, twice, but it is enough).
You have copper plumbing, new electrical wiring system. This is a cozy and well designed 1 bedroom. The apartment was completely rebuilt in the setting of a 1917 Spanish garden courtyard (Tons of flowers in the spring). There are 10 units here, and convenient STREET parking with preferential parking with city permit. The neighbors here are exceptional people who keep true to the sense of community on this site. In fact, we have two M.Ds. in the complex. The wrought iron entry gate locks as a safety feature. The address is 1342 1/4 North Edgemont Street. Access to the bus or subway, food or groceries is within easy walking distance; Four streets west of Vermont Ave, half a block south of Sunset Blvd., by Kaiser Permanente Hospital.
Rent per month (1 year lease) is $1,740.00 (free satellite and wireless internet too) with a security deposit of $800.00. INDOOR CATS WELCOME, BUT SORRY, NO DOGS (We have sensitive residents (WE LOVE'M TOO, BUT SINCE THERE'S NO ROOM TO ROAM, YOU'D NEED TO FIND A DIFFERENT HOME).
Looking for quiet, respectful, & low-key tenants. Good credit is required.
For more information and more good news, call or text Asher at show contact info , or contact us via email.

Hello!

I’m looking for a roommate in Runyon Canyon / Hollywood Hills for July 1st.

6 month minimum. Ideally looking for someone long term. Looking for a male roommate who is not working from home full time.

The available bedroom is very large and has its own full private bathroom and lots of closet space. The building has a hot tub, pool, elevators, indoor parking, central air / heat, dishwasher, mail room with package lockers, laundry machines, and great views with plenty of sunlight!

Post Title: Small 1 bedroom for quiet and respectful tenant
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

We have a one bedroom apartment for rent. It will be available on June 1st as the tenant hasn't moved out just yet and then we will have to repaint the unit. It is a cute apartment but bear in mind that it is on the small side so it is for preferably for one person only, there is a bedroom and a dining room, two small walk-in closets, bathroom with tub/shower/small sink and also a kitchen (there is a fridge but there is no oven in the unit, you would have to bring your own). There is a lot of light and a lot of windows, it is one floor only. There is a courtyard with secure entry. It has old Hollywood charm with hardwood floors and french windows. There's no parking in the building but there's free parking on the street, that said it is usually easy to find parking within a block but it isn't "always" easy, rather be honest. No laundry room but there are 3 laundromats literally each no farther than a block away. We are in the middle of everything, walk to school, stores, coffee shops, close to Griffith park, library and freeways and you can walk to the subway / bus stops as well. Water is included in the rent but not the other utilities like power and gas. This is a one year lease which then becomes month to month. We do not accept pets, sorry.

Now please read this: The building is very quiet and peaceful and all the tenants are nice to each other, we are looking for the someone who is the same and appreciate this type of environment. We are looking for someone that doesn't blast his music or TV at all hours, who is considerate of his neighbors, that is clean and doesn't let trash pile up everywhere and is respectful to everyone (tenants here are all from different backgrounds).

To qualify, please write a small synopsis on why we should rent the place to you. This place is nice for the price so we expect a lot of answers but we have had several terrible tenants in the recent past and of course we do not want that to happen again, so we will be screening and ask for references. There is a $15 credit check.

Thank you for reading and wishing you all the best of luck with finding your dream apartment! :)

Post Title: Beautiful 2 bdrm, split level, parking!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Beautiful 2 bdrm, split level, parking!

Centered between thriving Koreatown and teeming Hollywood, this quieter East Hollywood neighborhood is known for lower rents, diversity and interesting eateries that offer new experiences and convenience.

This apartment is situated on a quiet side street close to Los Angles City College, Barnsdall Art Park and three large hospitals. Access to freeways and major thoroughfares is a breeze, and you can arrive in Downtown Los Angeles within minutes.

With a Walk Score of 86 out of 100, this location is "Very Walk-able" so most errands can be accomplished on foot. Just minutes from the Metro Red Line (Vermont & Santa Monica Station) and other public transportation lines makes this area very desirable.

This 1950's apartment, with it's charm and comfort, is a split level unit which means there is no one living above you - bedrooms and bathroom above, living and kitchen area below! Nearly new appliances included (stove and refrigerator), garbage disposal, washer/dryer hookups, large closets, linen closet, storage closet, brand new light fixtures, gated parking and access to the backyard and side-yard grassy areas.

One parking space included in rent and another available for a monthly fee. On-site storage also available for a monthly fee. Responsive management and maintenance.

No Pets Allowed.

Showing by appointment only. Please text show contact info to schedule.

Description:

**1 MONTH FREE RENT!!!**
Free iPad! Free AC!


Welcome to Pepper Tree Ranch!

Pepper Tree Ranch offers newly renovated apartments for rent in the heart of Hollywood that offer tenants bright and spacious living arrangements complete with designer touches, hand-crafted details and modern conveniences such as in unit laundry and covered parking. Open floor plans and large windows offering plenty of natural light give a fresh, clean Scandinavian-inspired aesthetic. Pepper Tree Ranch offers you a unique combination of modern living and relaxed comfort, while being centrally located in one of the most engaging and diverse neighborhoods in LA.

Visit https://www.peppertreeranchla.com for more photos and information!
Email through this ad or Call/text show contact info


The apartments at Pepper Tree Ranch have been recently renovated: New kitchen and quartz counters, new stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher and your own personal in-unit washer and dryer, new bathrooms, flooring, and doors. No detail, no matter how small, has been overlooked with new cabinets, landscaping, windows and interior and exterior light fixtures to help you feel more at home. New roofing, upgraded electrical, plumbing and water systems will also comfort and ease of mind.

Be advised that the photos from the ad may not be from the specific unit you’ll be viewing. However all units have the same appliances, cabinets, countertops, flooring, etc.

FEATURES:
- Fully renovated throughout
- New stainless steel appliances
- New dishwasher & stove/range
- New in-unit washer / dryer units
- Open concept floorplans
- Detached garage unit for storage or parking
- New bathroom sink, shower / tub, floor tiles
- New laminate flooring throughout
- New exterior and interior light fixtures
- Upgraded plumbing systems
- Upgraded electrical systems
- Drought-tolerant landscaping
- Covered parking available for units priced at $2195
- Private patio and garden spaces available
- Walk score of 89

THE NEIGHBORHOOD:
Within walking distance are two metro stops and the 101 is easy to access. Locally, there are dozens of authentic restaurants, chill bars and shops at your fingertips: Sqirl is famous for its rice bowls and brioche toast, Square One, Go Get ‘Em Tiger and the new Friends & Family are great brunch/breakfast hangs, Jitlada is a local Thai favorite and The Virgil and are popular watering holes. The area is also becoming known for its backyard and street eats such as Burgers Never Say Die and Dave’s Hot Chicken conveniently located near the Tabula Rasa Bar.


Professionally managed by Crescent Canyon Mgmt. Apply online, sign the lease online & pay rent online!

Post Title: BRIGHT, SPANISH STYLE, GRANITE TOPS, FREEBIES, NEAR KAISER PERMANENTE
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Available June 2, 2021. LOOKING FOR A WONDERFUL PEACEFUL PLACE? Here is an ideal apartment because of its modern and warm interior, reasonable priced, fine design, good location, and for the charm and character of the place. This one bedroom apartment with free Satellite TV service, Wireless internet (Wi-Fi) free, a washer and dryer in the unit, and of course free water, trash, gardening, and exterior lighting.
We are south of the prestigious Kaiser Permanente Sunset Blvd. Hospital, it is a small, Spanish style complex, in a quite community.
This is a Second story apartment, with great interior. A private FREE satellite dish service which include expensive HBO channels. It has hardwood floors, granite kitchen counters and two A/C, plus a washer and dryer IN the service area inside the apartment. The apartment has bright exposure to the south, to the east and to the north.
Beautiful hardwood floors, dining area in the kitchen, fridge and gas-range, ceramic flooring in the kitchen and bathroom. This place is a great Hollywood location to call home (We had even endured a three-day movie shoot here, twice, but it is enough).
You have copper plumbing, new electrical wiring system. This is a cozy and well designed 1 bedroom. The apartment was completely rebuilt in the setting of a 1917 Spanish garden courtyard (Tons of flowers in the spring). There are 10 units here, and convenient STREET parking with preferential parking with city permit. The neighbors here are exceptional people who keep true to the sense of community on this site. In fact, we have two M.Ds. in the complex. The wrought iron entry gate locks as a safety feature. The address is 1342 1/4 North Edgemont Street. Access to the bus or subway, food or groceries is within easy walking distance; Four streets west of Vermont Ave, half a block south of Sunset Blvd., by Kaiser Permanente Hospital.
Rent per month (1 year lease) is $1,740.00 (free satellite and wireless internet too) with a security deposit of $800.00. An indoor cat is welcomed but sorry, no dogs. (Love'm too but since there's no room to roam, you'd need to find a different home).
Looking for quiet, respectful, & low-key tenants. Good credit is required.
For more information and more good news, call or text Asher at show contact info , or contact us via email.

Post Title: FULLY FURNISHED (QUIET) ROOM W/BATH & PARKING - AVAILABLE NOW!!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Hello, Hola, Guten Tag, Bonjour. Ciao. Kon'nichiwa. Hallo. Nǐ hǎo. Merhaba! :-)

Irishman looking for a room-mate for my 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment. Located on Swall Drive, next to Cedars Sinai Hospital, right in the heart of West Hollywood, Beverly Hills, Beverly Grove triangle.

Room is available for move-in NOW (but must be approved by building first), ideally for at least 6 months (but open to renting until end of August).

Rent of $1395 includes fully furnished room (bed with mattress, sheets, pillows and comforter, towels, dresser, desk, office chair) and all utilities. (Wi-Fi, AC etc). Also a dedicated parking space in underground parking.


  Why live in this neighborhood?

  - Great central location, surrounded by the neighborhoods of Beverly Hills, West Hollywood (WeHo), Beverly Grove, with easy access to West LA, Westwood, Century City. Runyon Canyon, Santa Monica and Downtown LA are about 20 minutes drive (on a good day).
 - Walk score of 90! You can walk to shops (Bristol Farms and Ralphs are blocks away, a couple of Whole Foods & Trader Joes in a 20 minute walk radius), the Beverly Center and The Grove, Post Office and banks. Rodeo Drive is just over a mile away.
- Plenty of dining and entertainment within walking distance too; The Ivy and Four Seasons are a couple of blocks away, with many world class dining options available in neighboring Beverly Hills and plenty of local cafes and bakeries. 15 Mins walk to Santa Monica Boulevard and The Troubador. Urth Caffe on Melrose about 20 minutes.
 - Great Farmers Market in Beverly Hills every Sunday.
- Despite so much to see and do nearby, Swall Drive is a lovely, quiet, tree-lined residential street, so you will feel at home in no time.
 - If you like to run (like me), you can head to West Hollywood Park or Beverly Hills Garden Park.


  I imagine that the location would work very well for someone working/studying at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center (only 3 blocks away) or UCLA (about 15 minutes drive from here). Or someone working in Beverly Hills, West Hollywood, Beverly Grove, Westwood, West Los Angeles, Century City.


  Why live in this apartment?

 - The apartment has been remodeled and all rooms have been freshly painted.
 - Room is FURNISHED with a bed, desk, chair and dresser etc.
- You will have your own bathroom (across from the bedroom).
 - Wi-fi throughout.
  - It's a great building. Quiet, mature neighbors, with an on-site manager, on-site laundry, secure entry with cameras
 - The apartment is on the third floor, the top floor. That means there is no-one above, plus you can sit out on the balcony and enjoy the afternoon sun.


Fyi, the apartment does not have a pool or gym and I have no tv in the apartment (I watch everything on my laptop).
  About me:   I am a 48 year old male. I am from Ireland (come from a small-town, conservative environment) and came to the US in 1994. I have also lived in England, Belgium, the Netherlands and Colombia (se habla espanol).   I recently relocated to LA from the East Coast and I operate a marketing business from home. Unlike the typical Irish person, I don't drink alcohol... my main vice being chocolate!


  The number one thing I am looking for in a room-mate is someone who is quiet.

 I am a quiet, private person and regard the apartment as my sanctuary and I do my socializing outside. If you spend a lot of time on the phone, like to have a tv or music blaring or have a hectic social life, then this may not be a good match.

My previous tenants have both said that they loved the fact that when they came home from work, they had privacy , peace and quiet and could go to bed early without fear of noise, loud phone calls or distraction.
Also, out of respect for my tenant, I don’t have over-night guests (except perhaps the odd family member visiting from out of town, once in a blue moon) and would ask the same from a new tenant. I understand that doesn't work for some people, but it will be perfect for the type of tenant that works best for this location. So, if you are looking for a place for your partner to come over and spend the night, then this would not be a suitable place.


Apart from that, I am easy-going about most things and want you to feel completely relaxed and at home here. I imagine that this apt. would mainly appeal to a mature, settled, conservative, cosmopolitan individual who enjoys the art of conversation, reading and travel. Also perfect for a grad student or someone studying for LSATS.   

Building policy is NO smoking of any substance within the property and (unfortunately) no pets.

Please feel free to email with any questions and, if interested, please tell me:

1) A little about yourself. (Social media handles, if applicable). Preference given to someone working outside the apartment, as I work from home.
2) What you are looking for in a living situation.
3) How long a lease you are looking for.


NOTE: Building requires all residents to pass a background check, so good credit and evidence of employment etc. are needed.

Move-in requires first month’s rent and one month’s rent as deposit, to be returned on moving out.
Many thanks for reading this far and good luck in your search...☺

*(If the ad is up, the room is STILL AVAILABLE, I don't respond to "Is this still available?" messages).
Neighborhood: (Beverly Hills / Beverly Center / West Hollywood Triangle)

Post Title: Los Feliz 2 Bedroom
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

$3050 / 2br - 1000ft2 - Spacious apartment with wood floors, north + south facing balconies and garage parking

2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment on third floor of 3 story building, with big closets, a large kitchen (with stove, refrigerator, dishwasher and garbage disposal), a fireplace, private balconies on each bedroom and living room as well as central heating and air conditioning. The kitchen has hand painted tiled counters. The bathrooms have Italian glass tile counters. The living room and bedroom has bamboo plank flooring and the kitchen, halls and bathrooms have tiled flooring. The apartment includes 2 parking spaces (tandem) and use of the building's laundry room which has 3 washers and 3 dryers and a rooftop deck with a gas BBQ, tables, chairs and numerous planters. The building has an open, landscaped central courtyard and landscaped front and the roof deck has views of the Observatory, Hollywood Hills and city lights.

The building is in walking distance of Los Feliz Village areas on Vermont Ave, and Hillhurst Ave., the Greek Theater and the Vermont Ave. entrance to Griffith Park. It is also a short drive to the quickly redeveloping East Hollywood area east of Western Ave., the Sunset Junction area and the Silverlake neighborhood along Sunset Blvd., as well as Thai Town and Little Armenia. Great restaurants and shops abound in the neighborhood.

The lease is for 12 months, we are pet friendly (cats and dogs under 25 lbs) and we pay for water and trash.

If you have any questions please email, text or call LeRoy

Post Title: Beautiful 2 bdrm, split level, parking!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Beautiful 2 bdrm, split level, parking!

Centered between thriving Koreatown and teeming Hollywood, this quieter East Hollywood neighborhood is known for lower rents, diversity and interesting eateries that offer new experiences and convenience.

This apartment is situated on a quiet side street close to Los Angles City College, Barnsdall Art Park and three large hospitals. Access to freeways and major thoroughfares is a breeze, and you can arrive in Downtown Los Angeles within minutes.

With a Walk Score of 86 out of 100, this location is "Very Walk-able" so most errands can be accomplished on foot. Just minutes from the Metro Red Line (Vermont & Santa Monica Station) and other public transportation lines makes this area very desirable.

This 1950's apartment, with it's charm and comfort, is a split level unit which means there is no one living above you - bedrooms and bathroom above, living and kitchen area below! Nearly new appliances included (stove and refrigerator), garbage disposal, washer/dryer hookups, large closets, linen closet, storage closet, brand new light fixtures, gated parking and access to the backyard and side-yard grassy areas.

One parking space included in rent and another available for a monthly fee. On-site storage also available for a monthly fee. Responsive management and maintenance.

No Pets Allowed.

Showing by appointment only. Please text show contact info to schedule.

Post Title: Master bedroom with private bathroom
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

This is a lovely master bedroom for rent. It is within a 2 bed/2 bath condo. This master bedroom is very spacious and has its own private bathroom and a huge walk-in closet. During the day it is very sunny and at night it is very quiet. This condo has a dryer and washer within. It also comes with 2 tandem parking spots, one of which will be for you. The rent will cover water and garbage bill. Electricity, gas and internet bill will be split. The room does NOT come furnished as shown in the pictures. The common area includes the living room and a kitchen.

The location is convenient and is close to the Metro Red Line. There are also many restaurants nearby. The condo is a 7-minute walk to the nearby Children's Hospital and Kaiser Hospital. If you work in any of the hospitals, you likely don't need to drive if you don't want to.

This entire condo will be shared with me. I am a 30 some year old guy who works long hours in the hospital. I will mostly only be home on the weekends. I am a low-key person and very easy to get along with. I rarely have people over.

The master bedroom is available now, but I will be willing to wait until July if needed. If you are interested, please feel free to email me and let me know.

This classic 1927's style Single Unit, has been renovated, it is 350 square feet and comes with: hardwood floors, Fridge, stove, walk in closet, full bathroom, and gas/water are included. There is an on-site laundry facilities. and Security Camera’s on the property.

To Make An Appointment: Please call the On-site building manager Nicholas. Please leave Your Name, Your Phone Number (Repeat it twice), I will call you back to confirm. My personal cell number will come in as "Private" and if you don't pick up I'll leave a voice message.
There are No Same Day Appointments.

Best,
Nicholas
On-Site Manager-Gramercy Gardens

Media Towers is nestled in a quiet residential Hollywood Village area between Hollywood and Sunset Boulevards. With convenient access to the Hollywood freeway, navigating LA from your new home will have you stress free from road rage. At the edge of trendy East Hollywood, the neighborhood is filled with locally owned restaurants, bodegas, coffee shops and shopping. Your entertainment is only steps away at The Palladium, Pantages Theater and Mann's Chinese Theater. Residents enjoy newly renovated homes with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, quartz & granite counters, on-site maintenance and office staff. Rent payments and service request are easy with our online systems. Add the roof top pool with panoramic views of Griffith Observatory, Hollywood Sign and Downtown LA, and you have a community you will love calling home.

The Collective is the ultimate destination for comfortable living in the heart of Los Angeles. Feel the pulse of the city while enjoying the comfort of your apartment home. Embrace the convenience of being just minutes away from downtown Los Angeles points of interest such as Vista Hermosa Natural Park, world-famous Sunset Boulevard, Dodger Stadium, Staples Center, The Museum of Contemporary Art, Walt Disney Concert Hall, and Los Angeles Central Library, just to name a few. In such a convenient location, residents relish in being close to so many necessities and fun destinations. Restaurants, shopping, schools, and parks are all just steps away. Our apartments for rent in Los Angeles are less than a mile away from the junction of the 101 and 110 highways. Commuting never looked so simple. Choosing to make our Los Angeles apartments your new home is an easy decision. Our versatile space is suitable for anyone to feel comfortable. Enjoy our well-planned apartments, on-site laundry care center, and sunny courtyard social hubs perfect for enjoying a warm LA afternoon. The Collective is located right at the crossroads of culture and community in the historic Westlake North neighborhood. Surrounded on all sides by vibrant city living, our community brings a breath of fresh air to a neighborhood brimming with life. Our one and two-bedroom apartments will provide the comfort and space you crave. Contact us today to learn more about our apartments in Los Angeles, CA.

Post Title: ***453 S Spring #1101-- 24/7 Creative Office Space in DTLA***
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! We are a real estate brokerage, if this space doesn’t meet your needs we may have or know about something else that does! Post Title: Big gorgeous apartment to yourself for 4 months!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

The Deets:

$1,650/month all inclusive for a private room and bathroom in a spacious, centrally located 2-bed-2-bath in East Hollywood.

What does this include?! Well, let me tell you!
Gated parking space (they are tandem but there’s one spot per room)
Laundry room on site with 2 washers and 2 dryers (coins optional!)
Enclosed, gated small apartment complex with a central courtyard.
Upper level apartment so no stompy neighbors over you.
High speed Wifiiii (Except for when it rains.. it’s LA ok? I don’t understand it either)
Use of a Home Theater with surround sound and access to many video subscriptions (Showtime, HBO, Netflix, Prime, etc.)
Full kitchen with a gas stove, washing machine, dual sinks, and a roomy ‘fridge.
Use of fully stocked kitchen essentials including high end kitchen tools
A cute little balcony to sit out on when you drink your coffee (or tea... no kinkshaming).
Vaulted ceilings, skylights, and a sexy little gas fireplace. Oh baby.
Central AC!
Your own big room with a wall-to-wall mirrored closet and cool column decor. Room will be unfurnished.
A bathroom you don’t have to share! Woo!! And it has a shower/bath and actual counter space for your stuff. (Low flow toilets though... sorry. It wasn’t our choice)
A responsive landlord and renting company that handles repairs quickly and efficiently.
Private use of the apartment, minus one bedroom. I will be working a seasonal job in Napa from August through November. You will have full use of the rest of the space. If you are in need of a two bedroom apartment, I can clear my room and leave it as a furnished bedroom. The total rent will then be $2,400 per month.
The 101 freeway is right around the corner so getting around is super easy.
The apartment is off of two central thoroughfares: Melrose and Santa Monica Boulevard. Catching busses to all major locales is a breeze!
The Vermont avenue metro station is a .8 mile walk away.
A Jon’s market is right up the street! But there are also lots of cute local shops nearby.
You can peep at DTLA from your bedroom window and wax poetic about the times we were able to go out.

You, you must be:
Gainfully employed and/or able to show you have at least 3 months rent saved up.
In your thirties. I’m too old to deal with 20 year olds, ok?! (I’m 33).
Quiet and not the type to bring people over.
Smart enough to cover your food in the microwave and not use metal on nonstick pans (This seems to be a big ask these days...).
Okay with alcohol use but not inclined to use hard drugs.
Able to do a detailed cleaning every other month. I’ll make it easy on you, there’s cleaning tools under the sink.
The kind of clean that only rarely leaves dishes in the sink and puts things back after you use them.
Willing to remove your shoes before walking into the apartment (We have white floors... and also, ew, gross).
Covid smart. Until all this blows over, going to parties and travelling are really big no-no’s. Masks are mandatory in all common areas of the complex.

About me:
33 year old female with a career in hospitality (No, that doesn’t just mean I’m a bartender...)
UC Berkeley grad, studied law in Paris, and peacemaking in Costa Rica.
Lover of the color black and hater of bright colors. I keep the decor minimalistic, and industrial like the recovering goth I am.
Amateur wine maker.
I sleep in, drink coffee, study wine, and work out in my free time.
I love to cook and would cook for you, especially if you pick a good wine to go with it.

If you’re interested in moving in, the cost will be first month ($1,650) plus $500 security deposit. This is such a great spot and I very much am looking for someone who will appreciate it and make it more amazing with me!

I would need recent pay stubs or a screen shot of your account information to show financial stability. This is hard right now due to Covid, I get it. My industry has been really hard hit, so please, talk to me. I’ll make things work for the right person.

BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

Post Title: St. Andrews Manor Apts-Charming 1920's Classic Brick Remodeled!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Come see our beautifully renovated studio apartments available at St Andrews Manor. This building is a charming 1920's classic brick building with newly renovated apartments featuring granite countertops, refinished original wood floors, new appliances, feature brick wall and renovated bathrooms!

Located three miles west of Downtown LA, ten minutes south of Hollywood, and five minutes east of Miracle Mile St. Andrews Manor is a great place to live, work and shop, with connections to Metro Purple Line & Red Line subways, Metro Rapid Bus and local shuttles. The Wilshire/ Western Station is within walking distance from your front door. Ralphs, Wells Fargo, Jamba Juice, CVS, Chase, Cinema Makeup School all within blocks to St. Andrews Place Manor. USC, Southwestern Law School, California Design College, and other Language Schools within close proximity. Wilshire Center (sometimes referred to as Mid-Wilshire, the Wilshire District, Koreatown and K-Town) is a true urban community. Cats allowed with an additional $200 deposit and dogs with an additional $300 deposit. Professionally managed by Statewide Enterprises, Inc. (A+ rated by the Better Business Bureau).
MOVE IN SPECIAL: 1ST MONTH FREE!! (13 month lease)

Post Title: Senior Housing Placement Services
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

We are a non profit organization that gathers information about various housing resources that we share with the seniors who reach out to us. Options may be licensed and unlicensed facilities, homes and apartments. Our specialty is working with lower income seniors who have disabilities but will try our best with any senior who reaches out to us.

Amenities vary based on location:
Room and board
Utilities
Food
Wifi

When you call in, you will be asked to complete an 10-15 minute intake over the phone. Next, we will process your file, draft a plan of action and then assign a care coordinator to call you back to review available options. This program is for seniors who are over 65 and most locations do also have some disability criteria as well.

Pricing varies by location and can be based on ability to pay, care, Medi-Cal or VA programs among other factors. Call show contact info to complete intake process.

Serving the following areas:

Post Title: 2 BD Apt Silverlake Ownr Financing Available
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Owner financing available. Nestled at the junction of Los Feliz , Hollywood and Silver Lake, come home to this prized Spanish two bedroom, one bath residence. Ensconced among the ficus shade of this quaint neighborhood, experience the charm of owning a Los Angeles classic. With an inviting, open floorplan, the layout is roomy and welcoming. Around each corner, discover the exceptional attention to detail. Fully updated while keeping its thematic integrity intact, enjoy new fixtures, Spanish tile, hardwood floors and custom wood shelving. The home maintains its original built-ins and 5-panel doors with correct period hardware. In the open and airy kitchen, find newer appliances and beautiful, clean tilework that augments the sturdy butcher block counters. Amenities include a dual zone mini split AC system, private laundry room in unit, assigned off-street parking space and landscaped front lawn complete with olive trees. Just steps from premier shopping and renowned east-end eateries of Sunset Boulevard and Silverlake Junction, this is a unique and exceptional opportunity for a first-time homeowner entering the market. Central to the Metro, the 5, 2 and the 101 freeways, you’ll never be far from where you want to be. HOA pays home and earthquake insurance, Water and building common area electric.

Post Title: Newly Renovated Studio in 1920's Building!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

- PHOTOS ARE OF ACTUAL UNIT--

***One month free with Good Credit and Proof of Employment***

Be the first to live in this brand new renovation! Beautiful 2nd floor studio apartment with new wood floors, original exposed brick walls throughout, and completely renovated kitchen and bathroom.

Beautiful and quiet 1920's building. New security cameras have been installed, the building has laundry facilities on the premises, and is well maintained and continuing to be upgraded.

Located just three miles west of Downtown, ten minutes south of Hollywood, and five minutes east of Miracle Mile with connections to Metro Purple Line and Red Line subways, Metro Rapid Bus and local shuttles. The Wilshire/Western Station is within walking distance from your front door. Wiltern, Ralphs, Wells Fargo, Jamba Juice, CVS, Chase, Cinema Makeup School are all within a couple blocks. USC, Southwestern Law School, California Design College, and other Language Schools within close proximity. Wilshire Center (sometimes referred to as Mid-Wilshire, the Wilshire District, Koreatown and K-Town) is a true urban community.

There is NO PARKING at the building.

Owner pays for gas. Tenant pays electricity, trash, water, sewage, pest control, SCEP and RSO fees - between $50-$75 per month.

The unit - AVAILABLE NOW. Credit and references will be checked. GOOD CREDIT REQUIRED.

Post Title: **453 Spring St #321-DTLA: Creative Office Space **
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY!
